org.drip.analytics.cashflow

Class ComposableUnitFloatingPeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.cashflow.ComposableUnitPeriod
      • org.drip.analytics.cashflow.ComposableUnitFloatingPeriod

  • public class ComposableUnitFloatingPeriod
extends ComposableUnitPeriod
    ComposableUnitFloatingPeriod contains the Cash Flow Periods' Composable Period Details. Currently it holds the Accrual Start Date, the Accrual End Date, the Fixing Date, the Spread over the Index, and the corresponding Reference Index Period.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
